derivation: or שֹׁמֵר; active participle of H8104 (שָׁמַר); keeper;
outline:
Shomer = "keeper"
  1. son of Jehozabad or Shimrith the Moabitess and one of the conspirators who slew king Joash of Judah
  2. an Asherite, son of Heber
    1. also 'Shemer'
strongs_def: Shomer, the name of two Israelites
